job_history.work_description: Supervising a team of up to 7 - 10 collectors in a proactive and caring way to achieve the delinquency targets provided by upper management. Managed daily operations, dealt with customers and supported and worked with the management to motivate growth.

Managed the creation, development and implementation of ticketing solutions for both existing and potential clients through a proprietary ticketing system. Successfully managed the activities of 32 team members in multiple locations.
Manage the daily operations of two showrooms, two ticket offices and one call center. Oversee customer inquiries, conflict resolutions and analyzing department productivity & efficiency.

Successfully managed the activities of 15 team members in 12 station ticket office. Developed and maintained relationships with third party ticket brokers, generated off property ticket sales from major Las Vegas strip properties.
Manage and supervise Ticket Office Staff in conjunction with Ticket Office Supervisor. Developed and maintained relationships with entertainers and their management.
Duties included managing and assisting the daily operations of the multi-station c ticket office for all incoming phone orders for ticket sales, customer inquiries, and complaints.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in supervising and managing teams of various sizes, demonstrating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Operations Management
skills.explanation: Has a long history of managing daily operations, developing and implementing solutions, and overseeing multiple teams, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Successfully managed teams of up to 32 members in multiple locations, showing strong leadership and management skills.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience in dealing with customer inquiries, conflict resolutions, and analyzing department productivity and efficiency, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Developed and maintained relationships with third-party ticket brokers, entertainers, and their management, suggesting strong communication skills.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Analyzed department productivity and efficiency, and resolved customer complaints, indicating strong problem-solving skills.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed daily operations, multiple teams, and projects, showing strong time management skills.

skills.name: Finance
skills.explanation: Has a degree in Finance, but work experience is more focused on operations management, indicating a solid working proficiency in finance.
